title: Global Education & Study Abroad Guidance
tagline: From University Selection to Landing Abroad
description: I provide end-to-end global education counselling to help students choose the right country, university, and course, and smoothly navigate the journey from application to arrival.
workWithMe: I offer personalized counselling covering university selection, applications, visa support, pre-departure guidance, and post-arrival support with honest, student-first advice.

faqs.title: Do you offer a free consultation?
faqs.content: Yes, a 15-minute Discovery Call is available.

faqs.title: Do you guarantee admissions or visas?
faqs.content: Yes, based on profile strength, preparation, and strategic guidance.

faqs.title: What happens after the discovery call?
faqs.content: Youâ€™ll receive a booking link to begin the process.
